thoughts.title: Back in Bristol, future Lumen
thoughts.content: I'm back in Bristol finishing off a Lumen API to replace the proprietary API I use for contact from anywhere (my site, this site, etc.). Contact sent from this site is both stored in a MySql database and emailed to my Gmail account. A Vue 'Admin' component in a Blade template (in a separate Laravel app on a separate, CORS-protected, domain) pulls in and displays any contact.

thoughts.title: Portfolio preparation
thoughts.content: This site has links to some previous work that I have moved into public repos. I've been looking over the work that I have done over the past few years and have started extracting some of the more useful functions into more anonymous 'snippets'. As it takes times to pull this stuff out and drop it into a 'minimum viable product', the output trickle will be staggered though ongoing...

thoughts.title: Refactoring for fun and profit
thoughts.content: Looking back on code written not 2 months ago, but in some cases 8 to 10 years ago is nothing if not interesting. So much information can be absorbed in a year that picking through projects written over five years ago can end being quite the experience!
